index.description: A comma-separated list of index names

ignore_unavailable.description: Whether specified concrete indices should be ignored when unavailable (missing or closed)

allow_no_indices.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard indices expression resolves into no concrete indices. (This includes `_all` string or when no indices have been specified)

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

deprecated.description: This parameter is a no-op and field mappings are always retrieved locally.
